rows.label: qst701201_msg0001
rows.name:
Excuse me... Have any of you had
occasion to visit Trigo recently?

rows.label: qst701201_msg0002
rows.name:
It's just that my instructor left for
Trigo and I haven't heard back
from him since...

rows.label: qst701201_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh dear... How long has it been
since he left?

rows.label: qst701201_msg0004
rows.name:
Weeks now... He told me it was
becoming more and more likely that
Torna would come under attack.

rows.label: qst701201_msg0005
rows.name:
He said he wanted to visit his
hometown before the Holy Grail came
and destroyed us all...

rows.label: qst701201_msg0006
rows.name: Can you tell us his name?

rows.label: qst701201_msg0008
rows.name:
He's in his forties, and he's a bit of
a cautious character... He likes his
daily walks in the countryside...

rows.label: qst701201_msg0009
rows.name:
Oh, and he's got a real passion
for glasswork...

rows.label: qst701201_msg0010
rows.name:
I can tell he's very important to you.
We'll start searching for him right
away, don't you worry.

rows.label: qst701201_msg0012
rows.name:
Absolutely. I know what it's like to
have someone you care about on
your mind.

rows.label: qst701201_msg0013
rows.name:
We'll get Thales back safe and sound.
I promise.

rows.label: qst701201_msg0014
rows.name:
Oh, thank you! I'm so sorry to trouble
you. I can be such a worrier...

rows.label: qst701201_msg0015
rows.name:
I've been told he lives at the far end
of Trigo.

rows.label: qst701201_msg0016
rows.name:
If you find him, could you tell him his
student Sharla's worried about him?

rows.label: qst701201_msg0017
rows.name:
Was it so wise to tell her that, Laura?
You know Trigo been...you know...

rows.label: qst701201_msg0018
rows.name:
I'm going to make a thorough search
and then tell her what we know.
